pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Simple Packages Which Do not Upset R Package Checks // Provides a function kitten() which creates cute little packages which pass R package checks. This sets it apart from package.skeleton() which it calls, and which leaves imperfect files behind. As this is not exactly helpful for beginners, kitten() offers an alternative. Unit test support is added if the 'tinytest' package is present.
